title: "Zed's missing. I'll just spam the MIA and danger pings so people play safe"
body:
_Two and a half minutes later _
{{champion:99}} "Oh look Zed's 7/1 without having killed me yet. And the 1/3 Riven wants to 1v1 him."
https://media4.giphy.com/media/10KEZs0WcRerrG/200.gif

Ever have one of THOSE games?

replies.body: Sometimes if he goes back to base and I ping Mia they'll STILL blame me for not following him. Like can I help u??? Do u need me to follow him to his fountain for u to spot him jfc
The real question is. "When DONT I have one of those games?"

lol nobody listens when I type in chat something like "leblanc left lane guys pls ward and dont overextend" and spam MIA and danger pings..and the roaming leblanc still gets kills..

no1 listens :c 

{{champion:7}} 8/2/7
but then they have the nerve to blame you

http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/images/news/March_2013/03_01_2013_-_smart_ping_announcement/Danger_thumbnail.jpg
Your pings do not scare me scrub.
And then zed says he won lane and stomped you, despite giving turret firstblood while he was busy vampirising your botlane at 4:50.
